DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to evaluate the thermogenic effect of ginger.
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy and eutrophic women will receive capsules of 200 mg of ginger extract (5% active ingredient) or placebo (cellulose), along with a standardized breakfast, with a minimum seven days washout period.
DOC.criteria: Females; Aged between 18 and 60 years old; Body mass index between 18.5 and 24.9 kg/mÂ²; Agree to sign the informed consent. Any chronic health conditions (e.g. diabetes, hypertension, chronic renal failure, heart and liver disease); Previous operation for weight loss; Medications known to affect total energy expenditure; Pregnancy and breastfeeding; Smoking; Alcohol use (>2 doses/day).
